channel.title: Newcomers on Apache Comdev
channel.description: Recent content in Newcomers on Apache Comdev

item.title: Welcome, Apache newcomers!
item.description: In this section we’ll help you take your first steps as an open source developer in one of our many Apache project communities. As an all-volunteer run organization, Apache and the many Apache projects rely on people like you stepping up to help out. Where do I start? - a guide to your first engagement with an Apache project How should I behave? - etiquette and codes of conduct at Apache Newbie FAQ - some commonly asked questions (and their answers) How many projects are at Apache?
